subject: Don't be surprised if this comes through your box tomorrow
author: mllejade
full_text:
Interesting article from the NY Times -- In an attempt to communicate 
with aliens, NASA will be transmitting the Beatles' song, Across the 
Universe, out into space tomorrow at 7pm Eastern Time, and encourages 
those on earth to play the song at the same time:

http://thelede.blogs.nytimes.com/2008/02/01/nasa-says-hello-universe-
meet-the-beatles/?hp

Sharon in San Fran
